com.ruegnerlukas.simplemath.matrix

Interface IMatrix

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMatrixd, IMatrixf, IMatrixi, IMatrixl
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Matrix3d, Matrix3f, Matrix3i, Matrix3l, Matrix4d, Matrix4f, Matrix4i, Matrix4l, Matrixd, Matrixf, Matrixi, Matrixl

    public interface IMatrix

      • getSubmatrix

        void getSubmatrix(int colStart,
                  int rowStart,
                  int colEnd,
                  int rowEnd,
                  IMatrix dest)
        Gets a submatrix of this matrix
        Parameters:
        colStart - first column index
        rowStart - first row index
        colEnd - last column index (inclusive)
        rowEnd - last row index (inclusive)
        dest - the destination matrix (must be the same size)

      • getSubmatrix

        IMatrix getSubmatrix(int colStart,
                     int rowStart,
                     int colEnd,
                     int rowEnd)
        Creates a submatrix of this matrix
        Parameters:
        colStart - first column index
        rowStart - first row index
        colEnd - last column index (inclusive)
        rowEnd - last row index (inclusive)
        Returns:
        the created submatrix

        c1 - the index of the second column

      • copyData

        IMatrix copyData(int[][] data)
        copies the int values of this matrix into the given array
        Parameters:
        data - the destination array (must be the sames size as this matrix) or null
        Returns:
        the (created) destination array with the same values as this matrix

      • mul

        IMatrix mul(IMatrix mat)
        Multiplies this matrix by the given matrix
        Parameters:
        mat - the right matrix (the number of columns of the given matrix must match the number of rows of this matrix)
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • mul

        IMatrix mul(IMatrix mat,
            IMatrix dest)
        Multiplies this matrix by the given matrix
        Parameters:
        mat - the right matrix(the number of columns of the given matrix must match the number of rows of this matrix)
        dest - the destination matrix or null (null creates new matrix)
        Returns:
        the result / destination matrix

      • mulLeft

        IMatrix mulLeft(IMatrix mat)
        Multiplies this matrix by the given matrix (this = mat * this)
        Parameters:
        mat - the left matrix (the number of columns of the given matrix must match the number of rows of this matrix)
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • mulLeft

        IMatrix mulLeft(IMatrix mat,
                IMatrix dest)
        Multiplies this matrix by the given matrix (this = mat * this)
        Parameters:
        mat - the left matrix(the number of columns of the given matrix must match the number of rows of this matrix)
        dest - the destination matrix or null (null creates new matrix)
        Returns:
        the result / destination matrix

      • negate

        IMatrix negate()
        Negates this matrix
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • isSquare

        boolean isSquare()
        Returns:
        true, if this matrix is a square matrix (number of columns = number of rows)

      • compare

        boolean compare(IMatrix mat)
        Returns:
        true if the size and elements of this matrix matches the given matrix

      • compareSize

        boolean compareSize(IMatrix mat)
        Returns:
        true if the size of this matrix matches the given matrix

      • transpose

        IMatrix transpose()
        Calculates the transpose of this matrix
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • isUpperTriangular

        boolean isUpperTriangular()
        Returns:
        true, if this matrix is a square matrix and an upper triangular matrix (zeros below diagonal)

      • toUpperTriangle

        IMatrix toUpperTriangle()
        Calculates the upper triangular matrix of this matrix (this matrix must be a square matrix)
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • determinantGen

        java.lang.Number determinantGen()
        Returns:
        the determinant of this matrix. This matrix must be a square matrix

      • traceGen

        java.lang.Number traceGen()
        Returns:
        the trace of this matrix. This matrix must be a square matrix

      • setToIdentity

        IMatrix setToIdentity()
        Sets this matrix to an identity matrix. This matrix must be square
        Returns:
        this matrix for chaining

      • copy

        IMatrix copy()
        Creates a new matrix with the same values and size as this matrix.
        Returns:
        the created matrix

      • setUnsafe

        IMatrix setUnsafe(boolean unsafe)
        Whether or not to check for exceptions.

      • isUnsafe

        boolean isUnsafe()
        Whether or not this matrix checks for exceptions.
